abstract: Henry M. Paulson Jr., formerly Treasury secretary, criticized outsize bank bonuses paid after the bailouts. | William A. Ackman has sold his entire stake in J.C. Penney. | Arbitration lawyers are profiting from geopolitical problems. | Wall Street financiers are spending big on McMansions.
